activities: We collect survey data regarding a users visit to a store or about a service rendered.  The data is regarding the customer satisfaction the users experienced and is done in an anonymous way. The results are reported in aggregate to the store manager.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We provide both phone and web contact methods to our clients and their customers. Users can also submit requests via our website http://www.mshare.net/websurvey/app?gateway=support&offerCode=02; We have agreed to cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
